short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show IMDb ratings filtered by female voters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows the IMDb rating of a movie, filtered only by female voters.

IMDb collects demographic data when users vote. Some movies and TV shows have drastically different ratings from women voters than the aggregate vote, and this extension shows that female vote alongside the aggregate vote.
